items.question: What does LaunchFlow actually do?
items.answer: LaunchFlow generates, designs, and hosts a fully functional landing page from a single prompt — ready to collect leads.

items.question: Can I edit my generated page?
items.answer: Yes. You can tweak text, images, colors, and layout in our live editor or export the HTML to your preferred platform.

items.question: How do I collect leads?
items.answer: Each page includes a working lead form connected to your email, Google Sheets, or CRM. No setup required.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: LaunchFlow has a free tier for basic pages and a pro plan for custom domains, analytics, and integrations.
